name: WGJ-1: Pixel Pipes
description:
Pixel Pipes
In a dangerous sewer, one robot has to escape through the pipes!

This platforming game turned out to be easy to make, with the skills I have, but difficult to play. The controls feel a bit weird and the Dash mechanic is strange. I am satisfied with the music and art though, and it feels good to finish within the week! It has some bugs so please be patient with it, and the jump button does not always work, I have no Idea why... And sometimes you get two robots...

Instructions:
Move - Left and Right
Jump - Spacebar
Dash - Spacebar + Direction in air

Get to the pipe to beat the level. Try to finish fast and with few deaths!

WGJ-1: Weekly Game Jame

I have decided to make 1 game every week.

When I have made some really bad games then I can go on to try to make a good game, join me on that Journey!
